message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. Let me know if that sounds good to you!
Alice, your product looks great, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $9,500 for it.  Let me know what you think.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can do $11,000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. I've already got another interested buyer, so I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $11,000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go to $10,500.  Let's see if we can close this deal.
I'm not quite there yet, Bob. I can meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,250. That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
